posts.post_content: Let me know what ya got at [url]signedt206@gmail.com[/url]
Still buying — all signed pre-1916 cards considered!
Anybody got any to sell or trade?
Beware the Ides of March!  Sell me your signed T206 cards!
How many signed t206s are there? I’ve seen a Rube Marquad but he pretty much signed everything lol

I have identified 57 poses that are known to be signed.  Most of these can be sourced to 3 or 4 different well known autograph collections, including the Jeff Morey Collection, the 2007 Pittsburgh Find, and the Tom Marsilio collection.

1. Baker
2. Barbeau
3. Blackburne
4. Bresnahan Batting
5. Bridwell No Cap
6. Bridwell Cap
